bibl.title: Tetragonos Stoa. A Commercial Centre in Augustan Alexandria?

series.title: Collection de la Casa de Velázquez.

bibl.note: The evidence suggests that there was, in the Beta quarter of Alexandria, a tetragonos stoa which served as a commercial granary and was endowed with an account office (logisterion), and possibly also a library.

bibl.title: Horrea d'Hispanie et de la Méditerranée romaine.

bibl.seg: Capponi Livia, Tetragonos Stoa. A Commercial Centre in Augustan Alexandria?
Javier Arce et Bertrand Goffaux (Édd.), Horrea d'Hispanie et de la Méditerranée romaine = Collection de la Casa de Velázquez. 125 (Madrid, 2011) pp. 117-124, 2 figg.

The evidence suggests that there was, in the Beta quarter of Alexandria, a tetragonos stoa which served as a commercial granary and was endowed with an account office (logisterion), and possibly also a library.
